metadata.synopsis: The player has arrived to the beach where the Sahuagin Attack Booster takes place in lower city after losing a stone in Iron Throne. Depending what state the attack is in (hasn't started yet, already happened and merchant alive or dead), then the stones can be found on either the leading Sahuagin, the merchant which the player needs to buy back, or in a dead fish that swallowed them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to Iron ThroneDebug add the stones (example, oe glo_emperorprelude_gortash)Drop one or more stonesLeave Iron Thronegoto 35 7 -142Go to the beach

0.text: Wait - that hum of Netherese power. It's coming from the merchant!

1.text: Wait - that hum of Netherese power. It's coming from that sahuagin!

2.text: Wait - that hum of power. There's a Netherstone nearby!
